App Name: Job Vacancies Finder
Package Name: com.stopa.jobvacanciesfinder

Brief
Job Vacancies Finder is the quintessential app for job seekers who want to leverage their network, enhance their visibility to employers, and stay informed about the latest job opportunities. With an intuitive interface and a host of features tailored to empower its users, this app is a vital tool in the quest for the perfect job.

  • Instant Notifications: Receive real-time alerts when employers view your CV and learn which keywords lead them to you. ğŸ“¬
  • Job Alerts: Stay updated with job alerts for vacancies that match your skill set. ğŸ›ï¸
